the developers passion shines through in every beautifully crafted cut scene and art style the difficulty scales nicely as you progress letting you finetune the challenge to match your comfort level instead of drowning you in complex stat systems the gear and attribute design stays refreshingly straightforward the real standout is the combat system which puts a clever spin on traditional turnbased rpg mechanics
